author: Jamie Feldman
title: Remember 'Hot Convict' Jeremy Meeks? He's On The Runway At New York Fashion Week
text:
Remember 'Hot Convict' Jeremy Meeks? He's On The Runway At New York Fashion Week Oh, and he was shirtless backstage. 02/14/2017 10:58 am ET Jamie Feldman Fashion & Lifestyle   
It‚Äôs been two and a half years since ‚Äúhot convict‚Äù Jeremy Meeks first looked straight into our souls with those piercing blue eyes, and one year since he was released from a California prison to begin pursuing his destiny: modeling. 
Now, he‚Äôs ‚Äï where else? ‚Äï at New York Fashion Week. Meeks walked the runway at the Phillip Plein show Monday, looking as handsome as he did in his famous mugshot . Peter White via Getty Images Albert Urso via Getty Images 
The 33-year-old, who served time for a felony weapons conviction, previously told ABC News he never ‚Äúthought that everyone in the world would recognize me for my looks.‚Äù 
He signed with a management agency in 2016, and then shared many a shirtless photo on Instagram. Now, though, he‚Äôs rubbing elbows with former French Vogue editor Carine Roitfeld and opening one of the most hotly anticipated runway shows of the week. This is the real deal, people. 
Both attendees and far-off onlookers were quick to share the news on social media. A post shared by Dena Silver (@deenersilver) on Feb 14, 2017 at 3:48am PST SHIRTS ARE OVERRATED: Remember Jeremy Meeks, the "hot felon" whose mugshot went viral? Well, #PhilippPlein put him on the runway #NYFW pic.twitter.com/5QsRF6owTs ‚Äî AP Fashion (@AP_Fashion) February 14, 2017 Uhhhh our favourite convict https://t.co/8D4Iwr1I8P ‚Äî KELLY DONEGAN (@ItsKellyDonegan) February 14, 2017 from mugshots & cell blocks to casting calls and catwalks üôèüèæ #PhilippPlein #JeremyMeeks pic.twitter.com/nCHzvQWe4w 
We have a feeling this is far from the last we‚Äôll see of Meeks, and we‚Äôre not complaining. Monica Schipper via Getty Images Shirtless backstage, because why not? Monica Schipper via Getty Images Monica Schipper via Getty Images Albert Urso via Getty Images Peter White via Getty Images Also on HuffPost
